abstract: Robbery suspect, whose identity is not released, is recovering at hospital in Elmhurst after being sideswiped by subway car in Queens; mugger attempted to flee crime scene on tracks during early morning rush hour, interrupting service on several lines into and out of Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: Train Hits Man Suspected of Theft
headline.main: Subway Hits Man Suspected of Stealing Boy’s Phone

snippet: The man fled onto the tracks at a station in Woodside, Queens, the police said. Service was disrupted during the morning rush, but he sustained only scrapes and bruises.
lead_paragraph: The man fled onto the tracks at a station in Woodside, Queens, the police said. Service was disrupted during the morning rush, but he sustained only scrapes and bruises.
